completed_tasks.task: Duplicate Implementation Removal & CLI Logic Integration

key_additions: Fixed color mapping with direct match statements
completed_tasks.impact: Reduced code duplication, improved maintainability by leveraging existing tested CLI implementation

completed_tasks.task: Web Version Push Down Animation Bug Fix
completed_tasks.details: Fixed critical bugs: blocks displaying red during line clear + push down animation not working in web version
key_additions: WASM color mapping: GameColor::Grey â†’ value 20 (was unmapped, causing red display)
Animation processing order fix: continuing_animations set before adding push down animations
Web animation update timer: 16ms interval (60FPS) for smooth animation updates

bug_analysis.red_display_issue: GameColor::Grey was unmapped in get_board_state(), defaulting to 4 (red). Fixed by adding explicit mapping to 20.
bug_analysis.animation_issue: continuing_animations was set after adding push down animations, breaking animation flow. Fixed by reordering to match CLI version.
bug_analysis.update_timing_issue: Web version lacked animation update timer. Fixed by implementing 16ms interval automatic updates.

completed_tasks.impact: Web version now has complete line clear visual feedback and animation system matching CLI version behavior
